name: bolt
description: A front-end toolkit of classes and evented behaviours.
author: @stephband

scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab -o css css && node-sass --output-style expanded --indent-type tab -o components/grid components/grid
scripts.build: cat css/html.css css/svg.css css/body.css css/index.css css/button.css css/thumb.css css/bubble.css css/input.css css/label.css css/table.css css/block.css css/flex.css css/layer.css css/type.css css/text.css css/color.css css/modifiers.css css/respond.css components/grid/grid.css components/dialog/dialog.css > dist/bolt.css && minify dist/bolt.css
scripts.build-version: npm run build && cp dist/bolt.css dist/bolt-2.0.0.css && cp dist/bolt.min.css dist/bolt-2.0.0.min.css
scripts.publish: git pull origin master && npm run build-version && git add dist/* && git commit -am 'Build version 2.0.0' && git push
